title: Mosaic Human Relief and Development Website
description: As Product Owner for Mosaic Human Relief and Development's website, I spearheaded strategic vision and priority-setting to enhance user experience and cross-browser compatibility. I translated stakeholder requirements into technical solutions by developing new sections and tailored content templates that optimized information delivery and engagement. Concurrently, I bridged communication between technical and non-technical teams to streamline content management and advance data-driven decision-making.
